benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/bundles/{bundleId}/customFields - Modify custom fields to bundle

covered: Valid Request (PUT): Tests cover successful updates with 204 for valid bundle and body across multiple scenarios (TC01, TC02, TC03, TC13, TC17, TC22, TC23, TC24, TC25).
Partial Update: Tests include partial updates (TC24) to verify updating only specified fields.
Non-Existing Resource: 404 handling when bundle is not found (TC05).
Concurrency: High-concurrency scenario (TC18) and retry behavior (TC21) exercise update race conditions and recovery.
Missing/Invalid Headers: 400 when required header X-Killbill-CreatedBy is missing (TC06) and optional headers are exercised (TC02).
Invalid Payload: 400 for malformed JSON (TC07) and unsupported fields in body (TC09).
Missing Request Body: 400 when body is missing (TC08).
Unauthorized: 401 for requests without valid authentication (TC10).
System/Integration Errors: 503 for dependency unavailability (TC11) and 500 for inconsistent data from integration (TC20).
Security/Validation: Input validation including protection against SQL injection (TC12).
Edge Cases: Tests for maximum fields (TC13), maximum value length (TC14), empty value (TC15), and extra URL params (TC16).
State Variation: Handling bundles with no existing fields (TC22) and updating existing fields (TC23).
Performance: Normal load (TC17) and peak load (TC18) tests.
Regression: Backward compatibility with older clients (TC25) and regression with special characters (TC19).
Recovery: Recovery from transient network failures (TC21).
Integration: Handling of inconsistent data from dependent service (TC20).
gaps: Rate Limiting/Throttling: No tests specifically verify behavior under high request rate.
Authorization depth: No test for 403 Forbidden due to insufficient permissions (only 401 is tested).
Partial Update constraint: No explicit test ensuring partial updates are rejected when not allowed (only partial updates are accepted in TC24).
Concurrency control mechanisms: No explicit tests for optimistic locking (ETag) semantics.
Invalid/Unexpected headers: No tests for invalid header values beyond missing header.
Additional negative tests: Duplicates within payload; mismatched IDs between URL and body not covered.
Content-Type validation: No tests for non-JSON payloads or incorrect content-type.
recommendations: Add a test for 403 Forbidden to cover insufficient permissions (in addition to existing 401 Unauthorized).
Add rate-limiting/throttling tests under heavy load (varying concurrency levels).
Add explicit tests for optimistic locking (ETag) or other concurrency controls to prevent race conditions.
Add tests for edge-case payloads such as duplicate CustomField IDs or mismatched IDs between URL and body.
Add a test for "no change" when payload is identical to existing data (PUT idempotence expectations).
Add tests for invalid header values (e.g., invalid X-Killbill-Reason or unrecognized custom header).
Add content-type validation tests (non-JSON payloads) and tests for invalid character encodings.
Consider data-driven tests to cover more header/body combinations and reduce duplication across TC01-TC25.
